first_title: Connection is a Path to a Brighter Future
find_events: See free resources available near you

how_to_help_section.title: What can I do to help people living on the streets near me?

items.text: Put yourself on the Public Happiness Map.
items.subText: For other positive and pro-active people nearby to contact you and invite you to Public Happiness Gatherings, like; public music jams/dance, free hugs, inviting passers-by to blow bubbles, connection pillow fights.

items.text: Create your Public Happiness Gathering now.
items.subText: Browse, suggest and discuss positive tools and activities to create a small positive change in our world in the Action Center.

second_section.title: What Is The Brighter Tomorrow Map?

items.title: Community
items.text: This map is a tool to reconnect our communities so we can effectivly support each other through difficult times

items.title: Movement
items.text: A global movement for anyone who has had enough of the issues troubling this world and are taking action to build change

items.title: Platform
items.text: This map aims to help people who are homeless find the resources they need to meet their basic needs and begin a path to a brighter future

contributors_section.title: Built for you by a wonderful team of volunteers at the Focallocal Public Happiness community.
